'''Goldflame Tajine''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Gilded Tajine]] with [[Dehya]]. The [[recipe]] for Gilded Tajine can be purchased from [[Azalai]] for {{Item|Mora|x=5,000}}.

Goldflame Tajine increases the Max HP of all party members by '''30'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
